title: replays on alpha client
body: Hi guys i recently downloaded a replay from a game where i played Nida from the alpha client, and i want to watch the game later, where does the game actually save? plz help and thank you ^w^

replies.body: You can find the replay directly in your match history!  Per the [Replays](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) guide, they will only last for the version of your patch bu you can also make highlights too.  These will save in your Documents folder!  Let me know if that clears things up!
yes it did and thank you for helping! :)
